languages.text: Лорд-капитану доложили, что пес проктора Антара Глейто создает беспорядки в офицерской кают-компании.
It has been reported to the Lord Captain that Proctor Anthar's dog Glaito is creating a disturbance in the officers' wardroom.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитану доложили, что пес проктора Антара Глейто создает беспорядки в офицерской кают-компании.

traits.locale_text: It has been reported to the Lord Captain that Proctor Anthar's dog Glaito is creating a disturbance in the officers' wardroom.
It has been reported to the Lord Captain that Proctor Anthar's dog Glaito is creating a disturbance in the officers' wardroom.

It has been reported to the Lord Captain that Proctor Anthar's dog Glaito is creating a disturbance in the officers' wardroom.

languages.text: Dem Lord Captain wurde berichtet, dass Proktor Anthars Hund Glaito in der Offiziersmesse für Unruhe sorgt.
languages.original_text: It has been reported to the Lord Captain that Proctor Anthar's dog Glaito is creating a disturbance in the officers' wardroom.

traits.locale_text: Dem Lord Captain wurde berichtet, dass Proktor Anthars Hund Glaito in der Offiziersmesse für Unruhe sorgt.

languages.text: On a signalé {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} que Glaito, le chien du proctor Anthar, était à l'origine d'un incident dans le carré des officiers.
languages.original_text: It has been reported to the Lord Captain that Proctor Anthar's dog Glaito is creating a disturbance in the officers' wardroom.

traits.locale_text: On a signalé {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} que Glaito, le chien du proctor Anthar, était à l'origine d'un incident dans le carré des officiers.

languages.text: アンサール代理人の飼い犬、グライトが士官室で騒動を起こしているとの報告が、ロード・キャプテンに届けられた。
languages.original_text: It has been reported to the Lord Captain that Proctor Anthar's dog Glaito is creating a disturbance in the officers' wardroom.

traits.locale_text: アンサール代理人の飼い犬、グライトが士官室で騒動を起こしているとの報告が、ロード・キャプテンに届けられた。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán ha sido informad{mf|o|a} de que Glaito, el perro del Procurador Anthar, está causando problemas en la sala de oficiales.
languages.original_text: It has been reported to the Lord Captain that Proctor Anthar's dog Glaito is creating a disturbance in the officers' wardroom.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán ha sido informad{mf|o|a} de que Glaito, el perro del Procurador Anthar, está causando problemas en la sala de oficiales.

languages.text: 行商浪人收到了报告，说安萨监察官的狗格雷托正在军官室里引发骚乱。
languages.original_text: It has been reported to the Lord Captain that Proctor Anthar's dog Glaito is creating a disturbance in the officers' wardroom.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人收到了报告，说安萨监察官的狗格雷托正在军官室里引发骚乱。

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'a Üsteğmen Anthar'ın köpeği Glaito'nun subay salonunda olay çıkardığı bildirildi.
languages.original_text: It has been reported to the Lord Captain that Proctor Anthar's dog Glaito is creating a disturbance in the officers' wardroom.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan'a Üsteğmen Anthar'ın köpeği Glaito'nun subay salonunda olay çıkardığı bildirildi.
